mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, STATUS, NVL(USER_TEL,'') USER_TEL, NVL(USER_ADDRESS,'') USER_ADDRESS, NVL(USER_BIRTH,'') USER_BIRTH, NVL(USER_POINT,0) USER_POINT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DATE FROM ST_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_USER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, STATUS, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
